Job Title: Data Engineer – Azure | 12 Month Contract | Canberra
Ad Text:
3 x Data Engineers required for a 12-month Canberra-based contract delivering modern Azure data platforms within a secure government environment.

This opportunity would suit a junior to mid-level Data Engineer seeking a stable, long-term contract.

The Role 

Designing and building scalable data pipelines

Developing and implementing ETL processes for data migration and deployment

Managing data migrations and ensuring secure data access

Monitoring and optimising pipelines for performance and reliability

You will engage across multiple teams and play an active role in solution design and delivery.

Required Skills & Experience

Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Azure SQL Database

Strong experience in Azure Data Engineering

Experience with data migrations, data access, and data processing

Proven capability building and maintaining data pipelines

Exposure to reporting/data environments

What’s On Offer

$500–$550 per day

12-month contract with strong likelihood of extension

Long-term, stable program of work

Exposure to modern cloud and data technologies

If you are an AUS Citizen and  are looking for your next Canberra-based contract, apply now or reach out for a confidential discussion text me on 0426 503 822 with your name and question and I will get back to you.
